I Have Been Visiting dr.mukesh Khetan for Past 5years, me and my family where very much satisfied with him but in recent times he has changed a lot, now he is busy showing his attitude and never answers any calls as if he has taken Obamas place, not even bothered to reply for a message. If at all he answers a call he reply in a very arrogant manner. Now he is in a feeling that he is the only pediatric doctor in hyderabad. Please show some respect to your old patients we relay on you.
